note.p: Burial: His father's tomb in the Chapel of the Tower of London
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB (father's entry); Hunter
Notes: Hunter gives election date as 11 March 1680. Source of death date is a note in the printed copy of Hooke's diary, p507. Not on PL after 168; although Hunter gives death date as 1682.
References: A Cook, 'The end of the affair. The correspondence of John Flamsteed, the first Astronomer Royal, vol 3 (1703-1719) by E G Forbes, L Murdin and F Willmoth' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 113-116
